original_text: After the reading from the Law and the Prophets, the leaders of the synagogue sent word to them, saying, “Brothers, if you have a word of exhortation for the people, please speak.”
korean_text: 율법과 선지자의 글을 읽은 후에 회당장들이 사람을 보내어 물어 이르되 형제들아 만일 백성을 권할 말이 있거든 말하라 하니

sentences.original_text: After the reading from the Law and the Prophets
the leaders of the synagogue sent word to them
if you have a word of exhortation for the people
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 백성을 위한 권면의 말씀이 있다면
